t: Dead Can Dance - Dead Can Dance - Amazon.com Music
s: I have been a long time Dead Can Dance (DCD) fan but never heard their original album until this time. While I found a couple of songs here that quickly became favorites, the production quality clearly indicates this is their first album. This is not a bad thing, especially considering this was back in the early 80's. While I'm not an audiophile...
